pageContent: Background: Sexual dysfunction is an important side-effect after radiotherapy (RT) for prostate cancer (PCa). The aim of this study was to compare sexual functions of PCa patients before and after intensity-modulated RT and to analyze their correlation with penile bulb (PB) doses and patient characteristics.

metaData.source:
Is there a rationale for penile rehabilitation following radical prostatectomy?
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24692247/
